results.name: Binomial transform of (1,-1,4,-16,64,-256,1024,....)=(3*0^n-(-4)^n)/4.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,3)
formula: G.f.: 1+ x -x/Q(0), where Q(k) = 1 + 3*x^2 + (3*k+4)*x - x*(3*k+1 + 3*x)/Q(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 07 2013
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 2 x)/((1 - x) (1 + 3 x)), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 07 2013 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,0]; [n le 2 select I[n] else -2*Self(n-1)+3*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 07 2013
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 30 2003
ext: Removed incorrect g.f. and e.g.f., _Joerg Arndt_, Jul 14 2013
